summary: "Halloween" (2018) is an American horror movie, the eleventh in the Halloween series. Directed by David Gordon Green, it's a direct sequel to the original 1978 film, ignoring all other sequels. Jamie Lee Curtis returns as Laurie Strode, preparing to face Michael Myers 40 years after surviving his attacks. After years of failed sequels, Blumhouse Productions and John Carpenter rebooted the series, aiming for a scarier film. Shot in South Carolina, the movie was a critical and commercial success, earning over $259 million worldwide and setting box office records for slasher films. It spawned two sequels, "Halloween Kills" and "Halloween Ends."
title: Halloween (2018 film)
